name: Parade Route
description: 14th place winner of the 2014 Clojure Cup! This was the first game made with the Arcadia project, which brings clojure to the Unity game engine. You are tasked with clicking the mouse on tiles to change the direction of roads, which the parade needs to survive. The game itself is really quite fun, and a total remake of Pipe Mania. The source code is located at https://github.com/clojurecup2014/parade-route
